reviews.review: Ce jeu est très bien que ce soit au niveau des graphismes (Je tourne en ULTRA) ou même compatibilité, il est sortie sur toutes les plateformes ! (Nintendo Switch, PS4, PC, et Même téléphone !) le point un peu négatif, c'est que quand on commence le jeu et que on est RANG 20 et ben c'est difficile de monter car les tueurs campes devant le crochet et ils focus toujours le meme joueur. Mais sinon, je le recommandes à tout le monde. (Sauf aux âmes sensible car se jeux est PEGI 18 et y'a quand meme pas mal de sang. Voila vous savez tout de mon avis :D
玩法很独特，氛围刚玩有些恐怖，但对新手来说，开始有些困难！我玩的逃生者，10局就一局逃脱了。不过这游戏玩家很有人性，我后面遇到一个屠夫，其他三个玩家全被屠夫抓得拔网线，就我一个人还在坚持，当然我一样被屠夫抓，不过这位大佬，抓到我没有把我直接挂起来而是把我扔到一个地窖口，我开始还没明白这地窖是干嘛的，点了下左键，原来是让我从地窖口逃生啊！

Eu ranking 15, tentando ter uma experiência legal com o jogo pra me divertir, caio com o que? Isso mesmo, Killers ranking 1/2, sobreviventes de rank alto também, é simplesmente impossível.
Fora que o killer tem vantagens roubadassa no game, enquanto tu, sobrevivente, só se fode o jogo inteiro.
很好，但是电脑配置不是太好，但还是可以勉强玩

very fun game once you learn the basics. don't get immersed and you'll have more fun; play both survivor and killer to gain knowledge on how they both work.

This game has the ability to be incredibly fun, or deeply angering.  Mostly because the community is very toxic. It's a fun game if you have friends to play with, but soloing it's not worth it.  Will I keep playing it?  Yes.  Will I enjoy it?  Mostly no.
别玩这游戏，傻逼制作组你妈死了
The community is extremely toxic, especially survivors

Devs who dont listen or give a fuck about the community and game have built an incredibly unbalanced and unfun game and system in which you are punished for not bringing the most overpowered gear everygame, and sweating your ass off. Try and play your favorite horror movie killer and watch yourself lose to a 4 stack with boon totems, dead hard, borrowed time, and decisive. Attempt to play a game as killer and you will immediately go up against the HIGHEST rank of survivors. Not an exaggeration. This game has a broken MMR system that is so flawed in the way it works, even if it worked correctly it wouldn't be good. This game 2-4 years ago was some of the most fun I've had gaming in my life, but the fucking assholes at behaviour ruined it for all of us. And I know these people cant take criticism, so if yall see this, fuck you Peanut, fuck you not_queen, fuck you Matthew Cote, Fuck all of you.
muito legal esse jogo, recomendo recomendo jogar em familia

it is a fun game and a amazing concept but one of the thing that is almost always happening to my is that the ranking/matchmaking puts me in high ranking game than I am in of course i have only played for 9 hours but it has happened over and over that I am sure I get to complain about

Full of noobs and toxic killers

A great game to play with friends and strangers. But i do have one thing that may improve the game, if only the game had voice chat in-game or even a text chat because it will probably be a fun game. It is just an opinion though.

I really enjoy the game but I don't think it's worth the price-point. A lot of the meta is based around DLC character perks to keep up. If you buy the base game you'll find your experience to be very grindy. How do you cut down the grind? buy a DLC, buy the Cannibal/Leatherface DLC that gives you BBQ And Chili. Are you getting gen rushed, buy the Hag and Clown DLC. When you buy this game in a sale it will be forty to fifty USD with all the DLC you'll need. At base the price is more around 70~USD. I got it during a super cheap sale, still costed a lot. But you better be willing to commit to getting all the DLC, unless you like losing.
刺激，技能附加品的搭配让玩法很多样

Perfection. This game is a semi-horror/thrill game in which survivors must fix generators to escape a killer. The game is hilariously replayable, and features a wonderful progression system that forces you to play multiple characters to achieve your perfect perk setup. Tons of fun.

you can't actually play this game. It's either super easy or you spend most of the match on the ground not playing because the killer is insecure. Killer is not fun to play as it's the same story - super easy or super hard. There's no middle ground. Also the hit validation is garbage, the devs have not figured it out in the 5+ years the game has been out.
15/10 recommend its addictive and Fun and always a Thrill
muy bueno pero algunos killers estan un poco desbalanceados pero el juego lorecomiendo para jugar algunas partidas diarias

Análise baseada na minha experiência de jogo e nos milhares de videos que vi no começo de 2020 até agora em 2021 sobre o jogo.É uma análise geral porque aqui digo como o jogo realmente é.

Prós:
-Gráfico bom

Contras:
-Jogo mal otimizado
-Maioria dos killers camperam e tunelam muito
-Jogo Pró-Survivor
-Jogo estressante,se quiser jogar vai ter que aprender a perder muito e a passar muita raiva
-Jogo bem desbalanceado
-Comunidade extremamente tóxica
-Nerfam muito os killers(porque os survivors choram demais para os poderes que o killer possuí)e as vezes deixam-o injogável
-Questão de segundos pra fazer um gerador sozinho(fazendo com que fique extremamente dificil jogar de killer)
-Behaviour faz de tudo pra deixar o jogo mais pró-survivor possivel
-Muitos bugs
-Maioria dos jogadores são ruins

Quando joguei o jogo pela primeira vez tive que esperar 15 MINUTOS E AS VEZES 16,20 PRA ACHAR UMA PARTIDA QUE NÃO DURAVA NEM 5 MINUTOS,pelos videos achei o jogo legal quando comprei vi que é estressante,chato,não é divertido e não vale R$36,99,vale no minimo R$6,00 e é muito ainda,péssimo jogo,não recomendo comprar,joguei dinheiro fora comprando isso que bom que foi uma miséria e não me fez falta.
buen juego, con una mala optimización
why do they call it dead by daylight when you dead buy the killer of in the survivor game of the day light by the time you're dead
such a cool game! i wish the game to be more thriller and scary
